article_title: No, Really -- Employer Health Insurance Is Better Than Government Care

article_metadata.author: Sally Pipes

og.description: Reining in health costs will remain a challenge for both employers and government. Evidence shows that the market-friendly approach of the former can control costs without resorting to price controls, restrictions on care, and outright rationing, as the latter must.
og.title: No, Really -- Employer Health Insurance Is Better Than Government Care
